roleset.name: Get smaller

example.name: Arg 1 as "of" PP
example.text: The expanding and contracting of your intestinal tract might cause some indigestion.

example.name: Same syntax, different semantic domain
example.text: The contracting of our profit margin has been occurring all year.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry contract.01, OntoNotes grouping contracting-n sense 2; maps to VN class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Claire.
Roleset based on verb entry contract.04, OntoNotes grouping contracting-n sense 2; no relevant mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The knight's contracting of syphilis occurred on the night of May 12, 1510.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: At this time, the only known Human subject to be incompatible with Flood Infection Forms is Sergeant Avery J. Johnson due to his supposed contracting of Boren's Syndrome from the residual radiation of a crate full of Plasma Grenades.
example.arg: from the residual radiation of a crate full of Plasma Grenades
